Blog.post: Weeeee..Today got training seh.. Den reach lot 1 damn early..miting fang and ping at 1..den 1245 reach liao..-.-.. siao liao hor me..? den in e end, ping forget to bring sock!! OMG!! haha!! go there meeting for certain thing abt lan zhong de.. =X..*mimi* cannot say out..=P..den both team training together!! So happy~ so long bo training together liao..=)..today e whole "new" members bo come..oso dunno y.. perharps is trying to avoid our physical.. i guess.. training half way...fang and na qurreal..but ok ok le..though is after many cryings~ =X.. hai hao hai hao.. ok can le.. den play match.. heez...1sT time wif szehui,weiqi, huiqi and stacker[S] de.. so happy!! weee...weiqi run so fast seh..huiqi oso.. me and sze hui lagging behind..bleahz..>.
Wee..yesterday nv blog cuz reach home zzz till 1230AM..bleahz..>.

Wee..~ SoOooOo happy today!! Dunno y neh.. Hur Hur.. At sch hor, jeff told me that kai jie after e soul garden go mit bai shou seh...LOL.. *xia si wo*.. juz imagine she say " yue zhang~~" to kai jie! OMG..!! -.-.. In e end is that toopid jeff lie to me..-.-".. but i spread ard liao..haha..kaijie tio suan till siao seh.. *yeah*..After sch go lot 1 mit ann at 3.15, in e end overslept..=P.. haha.. 3 den wakie..let her wait so long..haha..ard 330 den reach.. *paisay*.. go popular buy 4 pens and 1 liquid~!! Guess how much?? 9.35 bucks sia.. soOoo ExpensiVe! hEez.. Buy e chicken balls and walk to LIMBANG... in e end..toopid na told us change to yew tee mac.. diaoz..-.-.. walk so far..summore ann carry such a heavy bag cum a thick file.. so nerd..haha.. me,na,fang,yanping,qi,ann,wenyan,alina,elmo and jeff was there.. all so-called "studying"..heez..got la got la.. of cuz got study..~~ LOL.. go yew tee cc play ball, me and na same team and win 5 team in a row.. heez! Big winner...! today our tac so good seh...so happy our tac is coming back! =X.. den go tai ji~~ go yew tee park play.. den win quite a no. of match.. *clap clap*..having fun today!! but when reach home.. fei ji told me that oz server is down.. mabbe no more oz liao.. haiz..nvm! *alwayS lOoK aT e BriGht sIde Of LiFe* Scarli Oz will come back neh! heeS..

Yoz Yoz.. I m back for blog AGAIN.. haha..last time de blog not so good de.. haha.. no time and date provided.. And no xtra font de neh.. *clap clap* for blogspot!! Hmm.. Today is a BIG day.. CUZ CUZ CUZ.. it was Ting de birthday!!! Though her actual celebration is over.. (steamboat on sat neh..YumYum..!) but we decided to celebrate for her again.. Michelle bake e cake last night and siew make e sushi~!! SO NICE.. onli that e cake was tooooOoo HARD.. lolz.. Den sing happy birthday song to her neh.. Ting so paisay..~ LOL.. Then we proceeded to causeway..go eat soul garden.. long time nv go out wif seasonz and aiai liao.. missed e times... so today went causeway wif em..so happy.. heez..we eat e $2.99 de..1 word to describe "sai".. diao lor.. so little food and e service so bad.. let 6 of us squeeze into 4 person space.. but in e end still open another steamboat for us.. Isk,Ray,Boon,Samuel,Kai Jie (Yeo) and others bois oso there.. though they eat e $8.99 de, but wasn't having as much fun as we haf.. we played 2 game and one of em is e zhong ji mi ma... loser muz drink e soup..(damn salty..cuz add too much of jiang qing).. heEz.. den i winner.. drink 1 time nia..aiai drink 3 times..SONG BOH.. MUAHAHA.. When reach home, zzz till late for e meeting (Shit,Houzi,Qi and Ann And e extra elmo) was there...tok tok tok abt e team thingy and decide many things.. which i dun wish to publish it out..cuz mimi wor..found that relationship that was drifted apart was pulled close again and e sense of being left out was slowly decrease.. btw.. today na sms till very happy wor.. see e msg den always smile to her hp de.. lol.. *wiNk*

Today at sch li siao hui ying..muhahahahah..sOoOoooOoo fun..=P.. mean hor me.. but bo bian..she too fun to play wif liao..haha.. den after sch go yew tee mac.. study study..ahem..repeat again..S-T-U-D-Y.. LOL.. dun believe ask yuna,qi,yanping or even alina.. but mabbe sum of them will lie la.. always lie de..aiyoz..muz change hor yuna and huiqi..=P.. den den den!! we go arcarde.. play e catch doll machine!! den spent 6 bucks and finally~ tadang~ caught it!! named it SHIT...(toopid qi gif de name)..btw..today na got 1 new name.. sheena.. Sheena = xu yu na (faster version).. yaya!! she oso got 1..Mrs Fool and she got a new husband called mr IDIOT..HAHAHA!!!! den play ball.. quite fun.. go 103 play ball wif ah lun seh.. so good~ long time bo play wif him liao..but he old liao.. bleahz.. =P.. juz to update this blog..ann had lost her wallet which consists of 164 bucks and a ez-link card..those hu saw it.. kindly plz leave a msg in this blog..heez... fang had oso started working in bangawang solo liao.. perharps 1 days go disiao her!!! Now msn... yuna and huiling both lamer...L-A-M-E-R.. always so childish.. so i had to choice but cum blog and write diary.. den hor e huiqi hor..nick so sad.. den mood so happy.. siao siao liao.. kkiEz la.. i go lame wif em liao.. dun miss me.. (esp yuna,huiling and huiqi).. tao yan..
